title: Sample Code for CIDRA
description: A collection of sample code for CIDRA, demonstrating usage and integration with custom libraries.

tools.title: Check Internet Connectivity
tools.description: Attempts to access a URL and verify whether the internet connection is active.

params.name: url
params.description: The URL to be accessed to check if the internet is online.

output.description: Returns true if the internet connection is active, otherwise false.

tools.title: Get Current Date
tools.description: Retrieves the current date and time.

output.description: Returns the current date and time in ISO 8601 format.

tools.title: Generate Random Number
tools.description: Generates a random number within a specified range.

params.name: min
params.description: The minimum value of the random number.

params.name: max
params.description: The maximum value of the random number.

output.description: Returns a random number between min and max (inclusive).
